name: I, My, Mine
description:
I, My, Mine is an intense platformer  made during the Brackeys GameJam in about 36 hours by 2 people for the theme "You're Not Alone". 

The game follows the story of Jane and John who fall into a mineshaft, and their struggle to escape.  The only way to succeed is to understand the mechanics and figuring out how Jane and John allow each other to move forward.

Can you help Jane and John work together to make their way out?
